CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection
description: The function validateStdin() is vulnerable to command injection. The function uses user input to construct a command that is executed by the system. If an attacker can control the 'sha' variable, they can inject arbitrary commands to be executed by the system. This can lead to a variety of attacks, including data theft, data corruption, or denial of service.
